content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in telšiai district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of property in a divorce case the applicant jm filed a lawsuit seeking the dissolution of their marriage with the defendant vm the court awarded the movable property specifically a vehicle to the applicant the court also determined that the creditor obligations from a consumer agreement will be considered the personal obligations of the applicant the applicant will retain ownership of the vehicle and will be responsible for their personal debts the defendant is ordered to pay the applicants court costs and the costs of stateguaranteed legal aid
